title: Unboxing the smallest GAMING PC you can buy! - Intel Ghost Canyon NUC
description: Linus gets his hand on Intel's newest NUC, the Ghost Canyon! He does go a bit beyond the regular unboxing...  Check out the Intel Ghost Canyon NUC System at       Buy Intel NUC Systems: On Amazon (Paid Link):     On BHPhoto (Paid Link):      On NewEgg (Paid Link):      Buy iFixit Pro Kit: On Amazon (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):     Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:
